title: madcatz arcade fightstick tournament edition font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/te_6211.png)

if i'm not mistaken, the bottom is the same font as top but a different weight. the most similar font i can find is the set of porsche-like "911" fonts from iconian. i've seen this image's font elsewhere in print as well, but i've forgotten where. this image was made from a photoshop custom shape vectorized from a scan of the actual logo. the R, G, S, and K seem to be the key letters for ID.
author: neologix

comments.content: [Xenotron](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045338/http:/www.dafont.com/xenotron.font?nb_ppp=50&text=ARCADE+FIGHT) has a similar overall feel but it's not exact.

that IS it, isn't it? thanks very much!  
--  
alex.rosario  
apollolux.digital.designs
